title: Determine Student's GPAs' Standard Deviations
text: For each student, determine how many standard deviations (#ofSTDEVs) their GPA is away from the average, for their school. Pay careful attention to signs when comparing and interpreting the answer.

title: Thuy's Standard Deviation
text: How many standard deviations away from the mean is Thuy's GPA? Pay careful attention to sign. Round to the nearest hundredth.

subHints.title: Thuy's Standard Deviation
subHints.text: What is $$\frac{2.7-3.2}{0.8}$$? Round to the nearest hundredth.

title: Vichet's Standard Deviation
text: How many standard deviations away from the mean is Vichet's GPA? Pay careful attention to sign. Round to the nearest hundredth.

subHints.title: Vichet's Standard Deviation
subHints.text: What is $$\frac{87-75}{20}$$? Round to the nearest hundredth.

title: Kamala's Standard Deviation
text: How many standard deviations away from the mean is Kamala's GPA? Pay careful attention to sign. Round to the nearest hundredth.

subHints.title: Kamala's Standard Deviation
subHints.text: What is $$\frac{8.6-8}{0.4}$$? Round to the nearest hundredth.

title: Determining Which Student's GPA is Better
text: Which student's GPA is the highest in comparison to the school they attend? Effectively, which student's GPA had the highest standard deviation score?
